Package tools

Class FileIO

  • Object
    • FileIO
  • public class FileIO
extends Object
    Handles input / output for text files in plain text format. Each data type defined in the enumerator will have a text files dedicated to it. File names could also be specified to allow IO to other text files. Files are stored in the source directory under the folder DataStorage. External files will need to be stored in this directory as well.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private String FILE_DIR
      File path constant for use in this class.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      FileIO()
      Create the storage directory if it does not exist.

      • FileIO

        public FileIO()
       throws IOException
        Create the storage directory if it does not exist.
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown if the function fails to check if the directory exists or if there is an error when creating the directory.

    • Method Detail

      • read

        public List<String> read​(DataType dataType)
                  throws IOException
        Reads in data from a pre-defined data text file in the form of a list of strings. Each line in the file is saved as a list entry.
        Parameters:
        dataType - Data type file to read from
        Returns:
        List of lines from the text file
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown if the function fails to check if the file exists or if there is an error in the read process.

      • read

        public List<String> read​(String fileName)
                  throws IOException
        Reads in data from a user-specified text file in the form of a list of strings. Each line in the file is saved as a list entry.
        Parameters:
        fileName - Text file to read from.
        Returns:
        List of lines from the text file.
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown if the function fails to check if the file exists or if there is an error in the read process.

      • writeLine

        public void writeLine​(String fileName,
                      String text)
               throws IOException
        Writes a line of data into the specified text file.
        Parameters:
        fileName - Text file to write to.
        text - Line of text to write.
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown if the function fails to check if the file exists or if there is an error in the write process.

      • updateLine

        public void updateLine​(String fileName,
                       int line,
                       String text)
                throws IOException
        Replaces a line of data in the specified text file.
        Parameters:
        fileName - Text file to update.
        line - Line index to replace.
        text - Replacement text.
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown if the function fails to check if the file exists or if there is an error in the read or write process.

      • removeLine

        public void removeLine​(String fileName,
                       int line)
                throws IOException
        Removes a line of data in the specified text file.
        Parameters:
        fileName - Text file to remove data from.
        line - Line index to remove.
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown if the function fails to check if the file exists or if there is an error in the read or write process.

      • clearFile

        public void clearFile​(String fileName)
               throws IOException
        Clears the specified text file of all data.
        Parameters:
        fileName - Text file to clear data from.
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown if the function fails to check if the file exists or if there is an error in the write process.

      • getPath

        private Path getPath​(String fileName)
        Formats the path string for use in the other functions by appending the directory and extension.
        Parameters:
        fileName - Text file name to be formatted into the string
        Returns:
        Formatted path

      • createFileIfNotExists

        private void createFileIfNotExists​(String fileName)
                            throws IOException
        Creates the specified file if it does not exist.
        Parameters:
        fileName - File name to create or check
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown if the function fails to check if the file exists or if there is an error when creating the file.

      • logToFile

        static void logToFile​(String text,
                      Exception exception)
        Static method for logging exceptions or messages to a text file. The data is logged into 'log.txt' in the DataStorage directory.
        Parameters:
        text - Additional text to log
        exception - Exception to log
